unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Giving You Diwali Nightmares?**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Giving You Diwali Nightmares?**

unnormalised: Hey folks, looks like the humble gas cylinder is making headlines again. Turns out, after that brief dip last month, prices are creeping back up faster than Chintu can finish a plate of jalebis.
normalised: Hey folks, looks like the humble gas cylinder is making headlines again. Turns out, after that brief dip last month, prices are creeping back up faster than Chintu can finish a plate of jalebis.

unnormalised: Sources at IOCL (Indian Oil Corporation Ltd.) are hinting at a possible Rs. 50 hike per cylinder next week, citing global crude oil volatility. That means your Lakshmi Puja feast might just cost a bit more this year.
normalised: Sources at I O C L (Indian Oil Corporation Limited) are hinting at a possible rupee fifty hike per cylinder next week, citing global crude oil volatility. That means your Lakshmi Puja feast might just cost a bit more this year.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a local economist from Delhi University, says this could impact household budgets, especially for families living in smaller 500 sq ft apartments.
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a local economist from Delhi University, says this could impact household budgets, especially for families living in smaller five hundred square feet apartments.

unnormalised: Consumers in Mumbai are already paying around Rs. 1150 for a 14.2 kg cylinder. Will this new hike push it closer to Rs. 1200? Keep your eyes peeled!
normalised: Consumers in Mumbai are already paying around rupee one thousand one hundred and fifty for a fourteen point two kilogram cylinder. Will this new hike push it closer to rupee one thousand two hundred? Keep your eyes peeled!

unnormalised: Remember that time we had subsidized gas? Ah, the good old days! Seems like 'Acche Din' haven't quite arrived for the kitchen, eh?
normalised: Remember that time we had subsidized gas? Ah, the good old days! Seems like 'Acche Din' haven't quite arrived for the kitchen, eh?

unnormalised: Stay tuned for updates and maybe start practicing your wood-fired cooking skills, just in case! Let's hope this Diwali doesn't burn a hole in our pockets!
normalised: Stay tuned for updates and maybe start practicing your wood-fired cooking skills, just in case! Let's hope this Diwali doesn't burn a hole in our pockets!
